text: Rudaw Media Network (Kurdish: تۆڕی میدیایی ڕووداو), sometimes called Rudaw is a media group in Kurdistan, got Ricardo Ortega Fernández's prize in 6/12/2018. ==Criticism== Many international and local sources claim it is mainly used by the Prime Minister Nechirvan Barzani to spread propaganda for the ruling Kurdistan Democratic Party. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Television stations Category:2008 establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in Iraq Category:Organisations based in Iraq
title: Rudaw Media Network
